subject: Re: [junit] Testing same API - Different Inputs
msgSnippet: ... You want something called the Parameterized Test Case pattern. See _JUnit Recipes_, recipe 4.8. The e-book is only USD 25 and available now at
messageBody:
rajneesh_jindia179 wrote:

> Hi all
> Do we have a way out by which we can test the same API with a
> different set of inputs.(inputs to be picked up from a text file)
> I am looking for an alternative to creating a new testSCENARIO()
> method for each scene.
>
> test_CORRECT_DATA()
> test_INVALID_DATA()
>
> Both of these are going to perform the same stuff internally.
>
> Do we have a way by which we can specify.. run this testMethod() 10
> times, this one 5 times.

You want something called the Parameterized Test Case pattern. See
_JUnit Recipes_, recipe 4.8. The e-book is only USD 25 and available now
at www.manning.com/rainsberger
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
